parameters.text: "Wave: " & horde_wave & " | " & "ZR: " & horde_zombies & " | " & "Kills: " & stat_ZombieKillsRun & " | " & "BGM: " & horde_bgm & newline & newline & "Money: $" & PlayerData.Money & " | " & "XP: " & PlayerData.Level_XPThisLevel & "/" & PlayerData.Level_XPNeeded & " | " & "Equip: " & PlayerData.Equipment & " | " & "ECD: " & clamp(Equipment_Current.Cooldown - Player.EquipmentReady,0,Equipment_Current.Cooldown)
